message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
